participant_1.background:
My first major purchase was my laptop, and I still use it every day.
my favorite jello is the blue one.
I value my friendships and family relationships above all else, and I make time for them every day.
i have a poodle named nanette.

participant_2.background:
I am a software engineer who loves Halloween and pasta.
I hope I can find a way to combine my two loves: paddle boarding and makeup.
I think it's cool that I'm able to serve my country and protect my family.
I'm a single dad, but I'm doing my best to raise my daughter right.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.

content.text: Hey! I'm (user 1's name), what's yours?
I'm (user 2's name), nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, cool! I'm a student, studying to be a therapist.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I hope so too. What are some of your hobbies?
I love Halloween and pasta.
That's a great combo! I love Halloween too.
Me too! I like to go to haunted houses and watch scary movies.
I'm more of a costume person myself. I love dressing up and going to parties.
That's fun too! I'm not very good at making costumes, but I always have a lot of fun.
I'm not great at it either, but I try my best!
That's all that matters.
So, what are some of your other hobbies?
I love paddle boarding and makeup. I hope I can find a way to combine the two somehow.
That would be cool! I've never tried paddle boarding, but it looks like a lot of fun.
It is! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I can imagine. I'm not really into makeup, but I can see how it could be fun.
It is! I love trying new looks and experimenting with different colors.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm more of a jeans and t-shirt kind of girl, but I can appreciate a good makeup look.
Hey, whatever makes you feel good!
Exactly! So, what do you like to do with your daughter?
We love to go to the park, play games, and read books together.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure she's a great kid.
She is! She's the light of my life.
I can imagine. It sounds like you're a great dad.
Thanks! I try my best.
It sounds like you do!
Thank you
